Package broadwick.rng

Provides simple API for generating random numbers.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RNG
    Random number generator singleton class This class is not thread safe.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RNG.Generator
    Random number generator type.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RngException
    A RuntimeException for random number generators.

Package broadwick.rng Description

Provides simple API for generating random numbers.
